front.title: IEEE Standard VITAL ASIC (Application Specific Integrated Circuit) Modeling Specification

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The VITAL (VHDL Initiative Towards ASIC Libraries)ASIC Modeling Specification is defined in this standard.This modeling specification defines a methodology which promotes the development of highly accurate, efficient simulation models for ASIC (Application-Specific Integrated Circuit)components in VHDL.
